title: chainganginc
author: chainganginc
content: LAND OF SATOSHIFACEVirtual World video game being developed this is version .4 even though it says 4. We will officially launch when Version 1 is reached.You play as Deuce in a free roaming virtual world. The goal is to collect as much Coinconnect Cash and Goldenbit Before you die. The Dark Crypnet Suits will be out to kill you. There is a night and day system with rain forecast. There is an Cybertruck in the game that has a charge meter and can run out of energy. This is an early version of the game more features will be added. download link belowhttps://drive.google.com/file/d/1T0jCLEPI44H2CAZeYC2GT0NNb-WLX-lE/view?usp=share_link

comments.author: chainganginc
comments.body: Multiplayer version will be launch with version 0.8
